question: PRASAD Scheme, which is in news recently, was launched under which Union ministry?
explanation:
The Ministry of Tourism launched the PRASAD Scheme in the year 2014-2015. The full form of PRASAD Scheme is Pilgrimage Rejuvenation and Spirituality Augmentation Drive.
The scheme aims at infrastructure development such as last mile connectivity, entry points, eco-friendly modes of transport, interpretation centres, ATM/Money exchanges, and other basic tourism facilities.
